tests.name: Quiz - QUESTIONS.txt
tests.description: Check if the answers in QUESTIONS.txt are correct. This file must be edited so that the correct ( ) choices are replaced with (X) and no other changes are made to the file.

tests.name: Code - sema_barrier
tests.description: Checks the sema_barrier program for correct output. The threads may run in a different order across executions (hence the use of 'sed' to elide their indexes).
